text: rather he took leave of them saying, “I must by all means keep this coming feast in Jerusalem;Perhaps 3% of the Greek manuscripts, of inferior quality, omit ‘I must by all means keep this coming feast in Jerusalem’ (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.). but I will return again to you, God willing.”In fact, God did will it. Then he set sail from Ephesus.
